SELECT tbuser.id ,tbuser.deleted ,tbuser.process ,tbuser.created_at as createdAt ,tbuser.modified_at as modifiedAt
,tbuser.username ,tbuser.password ,tbuser.name ,tbuser.nick ,tbuser.phone ,tbuser.gender ,tbuser.content ,tbuser.img FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id = #{id}

SELECT tbuser.id FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id is not NULL AND tbuser.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbuser.process = #{process} AND tbuser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND tbuser.nick = #{nick} AND tbuser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone})
AND STR_TO_DATE(#{cursor}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') > tbuser.created_at ORDER BY tbuser.created_at DESC
AND tbuser.created_at > STR_TO_DATE(#{cursor}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') ORDER BY tbuser.created_at ASC
AND #{cursor} > tbuser.name ORDER BY tbuser.name DESC
AND tbuser.name > #{cursor} ORDER BY tbuser.name ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
